title: Auto Body Repair
description: Expert collision repair, paintless dent removal, and precision color matching. From minor door dings to major collision damage, we restore your vehicle to pre-accident condition with OEM-quality parts and factory-certified techniques.
summary: Collision repair, dent removal, paint match, frame straightening.
turnaround: Minor repairs: 1-3 days. Major collision: 5-10 days depending on parts availability and structural work required.
warranty: Lifetime warranty on workmanship and paint. All structural repairs backed by our certified frame technicians.

title: Ceramic Coating
description: Professional-grade ceramic coating application with multi-stage paint correction. Our ceramic packages deliver hydrophobic protection, UV resistance, and mirror-like gloss that lasts for years. We use only premium coatings from IGL and Gtechniq with manufacturer warranties.
summary: Durable gloss and hydrophobic protection with professional paint correction.
turnaround: 1-2 days with paint correction included in all packages
warranty: 2-5 year manufacturer warranty depending on package. Warranty registration and maintenance kit included.

title: Paint Protection Film (PPF)
description: Self-healing paint protection film installation using premium XPEL and 3M films. Protect your investment from rock chips, scratches, and road debris with virtually invisible film coverage. Available in gloss or matte finishes with 10-year warranties.
summary: Self-healing film for rock chips and road rash with 10-year warranty.
turnaround: 1-3 days depending on coverage area. Full wraps require 3-5 days.
warranty: 10-year manufacturer warranty covering yellowing, cracking, and peeling. Self-healing top coat included.
